name: centipede_damascus
text: When angels read your email, you realize how horrible a person you are.

name: cuddlefish
text: blister is pretty bad-ass

name: greyfield
text: Sort of, but here's a question I have unanswered: if angels can read your mind just like that, then why do they need computers to read your email?

name: lexsenthur
text: What if you're not thinkin' about email, or haven't even read it yet because google is bein' a bitch about recovering my password? What then, smart guy?

name: dusty
text: for that matter who has all their email memorized?

name: abe
text: I read your e-mail.

name: anomalous3
text:
HOT XXX SqRL on SqrL ACTION!
V1AgrA xaNaX from canada

name: soticoto
text: Enjoy... sciuridae coitus.

name: huber
text:
TODD - we need a Todd t-shit

Onstad make this happen dude

name: tinhand
text: If Todd can't read, why is he getting e-mail? What could possibly be lurking in his inbox?

name: odei
text: I'm pretty sure he knows how to spell key words like "porn".

name: dusty
text:
and there are two other possibilities besides him being illiterate:
1)suckin' dick did in fact but that van
2)his license plate wouldn't stay on and he happened to have that frame, and he's not picky.

name: spectre
text: Foil will not keep the angels out, but it does block the government's rays.

name: quarantine
text:
What kind of email would a drunken squirrel get

Seriously

name: d-pad
text: I love how Blister's just kinda standing there, letting it all soak in.

name: deusoma
text: I can't decide if it would be more or less surreal if Blister was in his usual spread armed stance.

name: hamscout
text:
He can read my mind all he wants, but bitch betta keep his hands off my CraigsList 'casual encounters' leads...

Also, if you give Blister a swiffer, he could clean off your heat sink.

name: ham_shoes
text: He looks pretty sinister just standing there like that

name: tom-ba
text: Apparently Blister remembered his purpose for coming back from the dead after all.

name: redjoker
text: i like to imagine that he lowered his arms in disappointment over todd's depraved outbox

name: red-barchetta
text: Why would you want to read Todd's mind? He is a terrible man!

name: ph3r
text: Thursday's recipe: Chicken!

name: tekende
text:
I think this might be the first time Onstad did the "interrupt a storyline with an unrelated strip" thing he does so well.

(That is not sarcasm, I really do anjoy it when he does that.)

name: mashisoyo
text: Is anjoying when you enjoy something angrily?
